#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int dp[202][2];
int ar[202];
string s;
int main() {
	int i,j,k,l,n,m,t;
	
	cin >> t;
	
	while(t--) {
		cin >> s;
		
		dp[s.size()][0] = dp[s.size()][1] = 0;
		
		for (i = s.size() - 1; i >= 0 ; i--) {
			if (s[i] == 'N') {
				dp[i][0] = dp[i+1][0];
				dp[i][1] = min(dp[i+1][0] + 1, dp[i+1][1] + 1);
			}
			else {
				dp[i][0] = dp[i+1][0] + 1;
				dp[i][1] = min(dp[i+1][0], dp[i+1][1]);
			}
		}
		cout << min(dp[0][0], dp[0][1]) << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
